Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:36:04

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1NYGNK_00
From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-05-19 14:41
Subject: Unplanned Outage Update: Oracle Cloud Services (SIOCS, RICS, XOC)
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague,

 

Please be advised that we are currently experiencing an unexpected outage affecting Oracle Cloud services.

 

Updated Outage Window:
Date: Monday, 19th May 2025
Time: 11:30 AM â€“ 4:00 PM GST

________________________________

Service Impact:
The outage continues to primarily affect the Store Inventory Operations Cloud System (SIOCS), resulting in full service downtime during the revised window.

Known Current Impacts:

*	SIOCS Integration and Application remain unavailable.
*	No inbound or outbound transactions are being processed to/from SIOCS.
*	Sales data is not integrating into SIOCS.
*	While XStore remains operational, please note: 

	*	SIOCS will reflect inaccurate stock levels due to missing sales integration and posting from XStore.
	*	Stock deltas will not function.
	*	Access to and operations within SIOCS remain unavailable.

*	RICS and XOC services are also still down.

________________________________

*	SIOCS will reflect inaccurate stock levels due to missing sales integration and posting from XStore.
	*	Stock deltas will not function.
	*	Access to and operations within SIOCS remain unavailable.

*	RICS and XOC services are also still down.

________________________________

Oracle is actively working to identify the root cause and implement a resolution. We will continue to monitor the situation closely and provide timely updates as new information becomes available.

 

For support during this period, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.

 

 

 

This mail was sent to you by

 <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/support/home>
